protocol_name: Adult mouse skin dissociation protocol (on ice)
protocol_name_html: Adult mouse skin dissociation protocol (on ice)
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9l8q6","text":"This protocol was developed to dissociate adult (8-10 wk) mouse skin \"on ice\". It utilizes two layers of digestion with a Bacillus licheniformis protease cocktail, combined with mechanical disruption from a dounce homogenizer. The cell yield is 3000 cells/mg. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":122,"length":23,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.group_name: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7p2qd","text":"Bacillus Licheniformis Enzyme Mix (1 mL per 23 mg tissue): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":59,"style":"bold"},{"offset":0,"length":23,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9g839","text":"100 μL b. lich 100 mg/mL (10 mg/mL final) (Sigma, P5380)\n1 μL 0.5 M EDTA (Sigma, A8806)\n899 μL DPBS (no Ca, Mg) ThermoFisher (cat. #14190) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fp0cl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cuibn","text":"Preparing enzymes: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avlvv","text":"The enzyme is made up in DPBS (#14190). It is aliquoted and stored at -80 °C at 100 mg/mL in 100 μL aliquots.. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tkk7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46s2o","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":8,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvkuv","text":"Enzymes, trypsin inhibitor, BSA and DNAse are made up in DPBS (no Ca, no Mg) from Thermo Fisher (14190). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ja49","text":"Bovine Serum Albumin - Sigma (A8806).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ad0f","text":"Hypothermosol FRS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lpj0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8evm8","text":"Required supplies:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cqc8","text":"2 mL dounce homogenizer – Bellco (1984-10002)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80edr","text":"Centrifuge for 1.5 mL, 15 mL conicals ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dc4qb","text":"Pipettes and pipet tips ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c818b","text":"15 ml Conicals (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3aopf","text":"1.5 mL tubes (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da5sj","text":"30 µM filters - Miltenyi (130-098-458) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ambcs","text":"Petri dishes (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b2n6","text":"Razor blades (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdg4m","text":"Ice bucket w/ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evsir","text":"Hemocytometers - InCyto Neubauer Improved (DHC-NO1-5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aba4u","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"apf93","text":"1.\tAfter euthanizing mouse, remove hair using Nair: dab with Nair, wait 30 secs, wipe with wet paper towel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"09792F60BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666672,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Isolating tissue"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4urgn","text":"3.\tScrape off underlying layer of fatty \/ connective tissue using scalpel before proceeding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11bg4","text":"4.\tMince skin tissue thoroughly on petri dish on ice for 3-4 min on ice into 1-mm3 pieces using razor blade while manipulating tissue with forceps \u2013 you will need to use grinding motion and vigorously break up tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6kuhf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"fv2c2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"22E201C0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":240,"label":"mincing","step_guid":"09797D81BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09797D81BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666675,"previous_guid":"09797D80BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gt15","text":"5.\tPlace 23 mg minced tissue into 1 mL B. Lich enzyme cocktail. Incubate on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"68cao","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"bs01o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bdfgu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3609B950BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","amount":"23","unit":5,"label":"minced tissue","step_guid":"09C5EFD0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09C5EFD0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666676,"previous_guid":"09797D81BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58qic","text":"6.\tShake every min; triturate 10x every 2 min with p1000 w\/tip cut (start triturating at 2 min) for 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8qpst","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"8d6t3","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"753sd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5p7me","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"u8gn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"EE0C8140BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":1200,"label":"digest","step_guid":"09D58030BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"45D0E0C0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":60,"label":"shake","step_guid":"09D58030BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"4CBBF730BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":120,"label":"triturate 10X","step_guid":"09D58030BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D58030BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666677,"previous_guid":"09C5EFD0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9q1f0","text":"7.\tAfter 20 mins of triturating on ice, use pipet to transfer digest mix to 2 mL dounce homogenizer. Use 10 strokes of Pestle A every 2 min (4 series total, 8 min). Digest mix should become turbid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ic0o","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8hra4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1pojd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"656F0E20BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":120,"label":"dounce homogenize","step_guid":"09D5CE50BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"D108D4E0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":480,"label":"digest using dounce","step_guid":"09D5CE50BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D5CE50BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666678,"previous_guid":"09D58030BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hkjm","text":"8.\tTransfer back to 1.5 mL tube using 1 mL serological pipet. Mix thoroughly and allow to settle on ice 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"21m1a","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"2pnbm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"76F63510BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":120,"label":"settle on ice","step_guid":"09D5CE51BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D5CE51BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666679,"previous_guid":"09D5CE50BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81ilc","text":"9.\tSave 70% (700 \u00b5L) of supernatant, leaving chunks at the bottom of the tube; apply to 30 \u00b5M filter on 15 mL conical. Rinse filter w\/5 mL ice-cold PBS\/BSA 0.04%. Save flow through on ice and keep filter on tube for 2nd layer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7gole","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"aj203","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7dfji","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"80C66A10BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","amount":"700","unit":1,"label":"save supernatant","step_guid":"09D61C70BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}},{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"8A460E10BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","amount":"5","unit":2,"label":"rinse filter w\/ice-cold PBS\/BSA 0.04%","step_guid":"09D61C70BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D61C70BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666680,"previous_guid":"09D5CE51BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4v5u4","text":"10.\tAdd additional 1 mL b. Lich enzyme mix to residual tissue chunks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"effk2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"23m3c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"9F56F800BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","amount":"1","unit":2,"label":"b. lich enzyme mix","step_guid":"09D64380BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D64380BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666681,"previous_guid":"09D61C70BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6fo3g","text":"11.\tTriturate 10x every 2 min, shake every min while incubating on ice for 20 additional mins. (50 min. total digest time).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eblh3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c8hck","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"45u4q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"45j1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eoh5u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fgos7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"da4jc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"p34b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c0vcr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"024B4E20BDB511E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":1200,"label":"additional digest time","step_guid":"09D64381BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"B0407F60BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":120,"label":"triturate 10x","step_guid":"09D64381BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"09725C20BDB511E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":60,"label":"shake every min.","step_guid":"09D64381BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D64381BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666682,"previous_guid":"09D64380BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9up1q","text":"12.\tTransfer entire volume to same 30 \u00b5M filter on 15 mL conical. Rinse with additional 5 mL ice-cold PBS\/BA 0.04%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ebbtg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"2vfn3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"1354B990BDB511E89623BD4580F1F46E","amount":"5","unit":2,"label":"ice-cold PBS\/BSA 0.04%","step_guid":"09D66A90BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D66A90BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666683,"previous_guid":"09D64381BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4249o","text":"13.\tCentrifuge at 300 g for 5 min at 4 \u00b0C. Remove supernatant & re-suspend in 100 \u00b5L PBS\/BSA 0.04%. Examine using hemocytometer with trypan blue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8fl9s","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ernt5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"37dej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"262E0300BDB511E89623BD4580F1F46E","duration":300,"label":"centrifuge at 300 g","step_guid":"09D691A0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}},{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"2F153790BDB511E89623BD4580F1F46E","amount":"100","unit":1,"label":"re-suspend in ice-cold PBS\/BSA 0.04%","step_guid":"09D691A0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E"}}],"guid":"09D691A0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666684,"previous_guid":"09D66A90BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":"Preparing cells for single cell analysis"}

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"91rfm","text":"14.\tAdjust concentration to 1,000 cells\/\u00b5L for Chromium or 100 cells\/\u00b5L for DropSeq.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"0A6F7640BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","id":666685,"previous_id":666684,"previous_guid":"09D691A0BDB411E89623BD4580F1F46E","section":"Preparing cells for single cell analysis"}
